send header authorization code to favTrips api -
modify the authMiddleware as per call -
add & delete fav trips api calls - done


--- login & headed
loading indication on button  - 
logout option in header -
page loading component -

-- trip --
favtrips fetching api call + similar products, recommendations
trip schema & trip api call


--- Trip Page -- 

fetch favtrips api call  [ similarities & recommendations data in single call]
fetch favtrips client side actions
